name: Nodes
title: CS Lymph Nodes
notes:
**Note 1**:  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field. Distant nodes are coded in CS Mets at DX.

**Note 2**:  Periaortic and pericaval lymph nodes are classified as regional nodes for AJCC 7 staging. They are now coded in CS Lymph Nodes.
